General commands: ```{}```

anime: ?anime [anime name] Looks for an anime on MAL.
roll: ?roll [n]d[n] Roll dice in NdN format, where the first n is the number of rolls and the second n is the number of die sides. For example ?roll 3d5 will roll 3 5-sided dice.
choose: ?choose [item1] [item2] [item3]...  Choose an item from a list of items separated by spaces.
salt: ?salt [chance] [times] The chance of an event happeneing after x amount of times. [chance] can be a percentage or decimal, for example ?salt 0.05 5 and ?salt 5% 5 are the same.
avatar: ?avatar @some_user Shows the mentioned user's avatar, must mention the user.
joined: ?joined @some_user Shows when a user joined this server. Must mention the user.
repeat: ?repeat [n] [message] Repeats the message n times. where n <= 5.
stackoverflow: ?stackoverflow [search term] Search for an answer on stackoverflow, highly experimental feature, use at your own risk.
latex: ?latex [latex equation] Renders a latex equation online.
ship: ?ship [ship name] Searches for a ship in World of Warships and prints out its stats.(Work in progress)
shame: ?shame [WoWs_player_name] or ?shame [@discord_user] Displays the stats of the player. If [WoWs_player_name] is used it will search for the player online, if [@discord_user] is used, it will search for the player in the shamelist.
summon: ?summon Make the bot join your current voice channel, needs to be in a voice channel.
play: ?play [Song name] or ?play[url] Plays a song. If there is a song currently in the queue, then it is queued until the next song is done playing.
volume: ?volume [value] Sets the volume of the currently playing song. [value] must be a integer.
skip: ?skip Vote to skip a song. The song requester can automatically skip. 3 skip votes are needed for the song to be skipped.
playing: ?playing Shows info about the currently played song.
